trans-unit.source: Contains transformation data that is accumulated when manipulation events occur.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller av Omvandlingsdata som samlats när manipulering händelser inträffar.

trans-unit.source: The ManipulationDelta class contains information about the changes in the position of a manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ManipulationDelta innehåller information om ändringar i positionen för en manipulation.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] interprets the changes as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]tolkar ändringarna som en <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event occurs on a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, use the properties on a ManipulationDelta object to transform the object that should be manipulated.
trans-unit.target: När den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>händelse inträffar för en <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, använda egenskaperna på ett ManipulationDelta-objekt för att omvandla det objekt som ska hanteras.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs> class provides two properties of type ManipulationDelta: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.DeltaManipulation%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.CumulativeManipulation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs>klassen innehåller två egenskaper av typen ManipulationDelta: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.DeltaManipulation%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.CumulativeManipulation%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.CumulativeManipulation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.DeltaManipulation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om ändringar finns i [indata översikt](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Ett exempel på ett program som svarar på ändringar finns [genomgång: skapa din första Touch program](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The linear motion of the manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Linjär rörelse manipulering i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The rotation of the manipulation in degrees.
trans-unit.target: Rotation av manipulering i grader.

trans-unit.source: The amount the manipulation has resized as a multiplier.
trans-unit.target: Hur mycket modifieringen storleken har som en multiplikator.

trans-unit.source: The amount the manipulation has resized in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Hur mycket modifieringen storleken har i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount the manipulation has resized in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger graden modifieringen storleken har i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> and Expansion properties both report a resizing manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>och Expansion egenskaper båda rapportera storleksändring manipulering.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>

trans-unit.source: The difference between the two is the way in which the value is reported.
trans-unit.target: Skillnaden mellan två går där värdet rapporteras.

trans-unit.source: The Expansion property reports the resizing manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Expansion rapporterar storleksändring manipulering i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> property reports the value as a multiplier.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>egenskapen rapporterar värdet som en multiplikator.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> is 0.5, the manipulation is interpreted as decreasing the size by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>är 0,5, hantera tolkas som att minska storleken med 50 procent.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> is 2, the manipulation is interpreted as increasing the size by 100 percent.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>är 2, hantera tolkas som ökar storleken med 100 procent.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount the manipulation has resized in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Hur mycket modifieringen storleken har i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rotation of the manipulation in degrees.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger rotationen av modifieringen i grader.

trans-unit.source: The Rotation property reports the way a manipulation is interpreted as rotating around an axis.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Rotation rapporterar hur en manipulering tolkas som roterar runt en axel.

trans-unit.source: The axis is usually the point between the two points of contact that initiated the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Axeln är vanligtvis punkten mellan de två kontaktpunkter som initierade modifieringen.

trans-unit.source: The rotation of the manipulation in degrees.
trans-unit.target: Rotation av manipulering i grader.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount the manipulation has resized as a multiplier.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger graden modifieringen storleken har som en multiplikator.

trans-unit.source: The Scale and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A> properties both report a resizing manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Skala och <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A>Egenskaper båda rapportera storleksändring manipulering.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A>

trans-unit.source: The difference between the two is the way in which the value is reported.
trans-unit.target: Skillnaden mellan två går där värdet rapporteras.

trans-unit.source: The Scale property reports the value as a multiplier.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen skala rapporterar värdet som en multiplikator.

trans-unit.source: If Scale is 0.5, the manipulation is interpreted as decreasing the size by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: Om skalan är 0,5, tolkas hantera som att minska storleken med 50 procent.

trans-unit.source: If Scale is 2, the manipulation is interpreted as increasing the size by 100 percent.
trans-unit.target: Om skalan är 2, tolkas hantera som ökar storleken med 100 procent.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A> property reports the resizing manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A>egenskapen rapporterar storleksändring manipulering i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount the manipulation has resized.
trans-unit.target: Hur mycket modifieringen storleken har.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the linear motion of the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger modifieringen linjär rörelse.

trans-unit.source: The Translation property reports the way a manipulation is interpreted as moving horizontally and vertically on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen översättning rapporterar hur en manipulering tolkas som att flytta vågrätt och lodrätt på skärmen.

trans-unit.source: The linear motion of the manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Linjär rörelse manipulering i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
